org.digijava.kernel.persistence.interceptors

Class AmpEntityInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor
      • org.digijava.kernel.persistence.interceptors.AmpEntityInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.hibernate.Interceptor

    public class AmpEntityInterceptor
extends org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor
    Hibernate interceptor to translate all AMP entities and to touch Auditable entities
    See Also:
